title: The Most Important Supreme Court Cases of 2021
itunes:title: The Most Important Supreme Court Cases of 2021
description:
Host June Grasso discusses the critical Supreme Court decisions in 2021 involving Obamacare, gay rights, voting rights, student athletes, and free speech with Bloomberg News Supreme Court Reporter Greg Stohr and Bloomberg Law Supreme Court Reporter Kimberly Strawbridge Robinson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
